short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cleanup webpages - remove ads and non-necessary elements, in order to have a clean, readable page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cleanup a webpage by removing non-important elements (ads, header, footer, sidebars, etc) in order to have a clean webpage that can be downloaded/printed.
